data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 17395, Version Hash: 7748b21b7d9dfb45697764028f645f06c87c5df2
data.actual_result: After the steps and you hover over a user, it does the over effect for 1 second and stops.
data.expected_result: When hovering over a user on the right side in the user list, it stays in the hovering effect.
data.short_description: Hovering over user will break when scrolling down for a while.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with a lot of users (Like Discord Testers) - Start scrolling the right side user list really fast (I use a infinite scroll wheel function on my mouse), you know you're going fast enough if the users aren't rendering. - Do this for like 15 - 20 seconds and then stop scrolling - When you're done scrolling and it stopped, hover over a user and don't move your mouse. - When hovering you see that the hover effect disappears after 1 second, what isn't normal.
